description:
Meeting Ryouichi Sumi and the advice from Hasegawa have put doubt into Ritsu Onodera`s heart. He remembers the reason he transferred to Marukawa and wonders if he can continue to work as a manga editor. 
While he is struggling, Takano asks him if he wants transfer to the literature department and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: After a Storm Comes a Calm.
After a Storm Comes a Calm.
After a storm comes a calm.
